languages.text: {n}Кибелла вдруг вздергивает подбородок — ее темный взор устремлен на вас.{/n} "...но ты — ты не ощущаешь этого леденящего ужаса, так? Твой мир и мир ксеносов не так уж различны? Полные притворства и масок, скрывающих фальшивые устремления и жажду наслаждений..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла вдруг вздергивает подбородок — ее мутный темный взор устремлен на вас.{/n} "...но ты — ты не ощущаешь этого леденящего ужаса, так ведь? Твой мир и мир ксеносов, населяющих эту бездну — они не так уж и различны? Полные притворства и масок, скрывающих фальшивые устремления и жажду наслаждений..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла вдруг вздергивает подбородок — ее темный взор устремлен на вас.{/n} "...но ты — ты не ощущаешь этого леденящего ужаса, так? Твой мир и мир ксеносов не так уж различны? Полные притворства и масок, скрывающих фальшивые устремления и жажду наслаждений..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you down with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

{n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah levanta la cabeza de repente y clava en ti sus ojos oscuros.{/n} «Pero usted... usted no siente este miedo paralizante, ¿me equivoco? Su mundo y el de los xenos no son tan distintos, ¿verdad? Los dos están llenos de falsedad y máscaras que ocultan aspiraciones banales y una incontenible búsqueda de placer...».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah levanta la cabeza de repente y clava en ti sus ojos oscuros.{/n} «Pero usted... usted no siente este miedo paralizante, ¿me equivoco? Su mundo y el de los xenos no son tan distintos, ¿verdad? Los dos están llenos de falsedad y máscaras que ocultan aspiraciones banales y una incontenible búsqueda de placer...».

languages.text: {n}キベラが不意に頭を上げ、暗い視線であなたを縫い留める。{/n}「だけどあなたは…この漠然とした恐怖を感じないのでしょう？あなたの世界と異種族の世界はそこまで違わないのよね？どちらも偽りの願望と快楽への渇望を覆い隠す二枚舌と仮面であふれている」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが不意に頭を上げ、暗い視線であなたを縫い留める。{/n}「だけどあなたは…この漠然とした恐怖を感じないのでしょう？あなたの世界と異種族の世界はそこまで違わないのよね？どちらも偽りの願望と快楽への渇望を覆い隠す二枚舌と仮面であふれている」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈突然抬起头，阴沉的目光死死地盯着你。{/n}“不过你……你应该感受不到这种恐怖，是这样吧？毕竟你的世界与异形的世界没有太多不同之处，不是吗？两者都充满了虚假的面具和口是心非，掩盖着虚假的愿望，隐藏着对欢愉的渴望……”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈突然抬起头，阴沉的目光死死地盯着你。{/n}“不过你……你应该感受不到这种恐怖，是这样吧？毕竟你的世界与异形的世界没有太多不同之处，不是吗？两者都充满了虚假的面具和口是心非，掩盖着虚假的愿望，隐藏着对欢愉的渴望……”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah hebt plötzlich den Kopf und fixiert dich mit ihrem dunklen Blick.{/n} "Aber Ihr ... Ihr spürt diese lähmende Angst nicht, oder? Eure Welt und die Welt der Xenos unterscheiden sich gar nicht so sehr, nicht wahr? Beide sind voller Doppelzüngigkeit und Masken, die falsche Wünsche und einen Drang nach Vergnügen verhüllen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah hebt plötzlich den Kopf und fixiert dich mit ihrem dunklen Blick.{/n} "Aber Ihr ... Ihr spürt diese lähmende Angst nicht, oder? Eure Welt und die Welt der Xenos unterscheiden sich gar nicht so sehr, nicht wahr? Beide sind voller Doppelzüngigkeit und Masken, die falsche Wünsche und einen Drang nach Vergnügen verhüllen ..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah redresse subitement la tête et plante sur vous son regard ténébreux.{/n} « Mais... vous ne ressentez pas cette peur paralysante, n'est-ce pas ? Après tout, votre monde n'est pas si différent de celui des xénos. Ils sont tous deux d'une duplicité sans bornes et portent des masques destinés à dissimuler les fausses ambitions et une soif inextinguible de jouissance... »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, aniden başını kaldırıp kara bakışlarıyla kıpırdamana engel oluyor.{/n} "Oysa sen... Korkudan dehşete düşmüyorsun, değil mi? Senin dünyanla zenoların dünyası o kadar da farklı sayılmaz, değil mi? İkisi de ikiyüzlülükle, emelleri saklayan maskelerle ve zevke düşkünlükle dolu..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah suddenly raises her head, pinning you with her dark gaze.{/n} "But you... you don't feel this petrifying fear, do you? Your world and the world of the xenos aren't all that different, are they? Both are full of duplicity and masks that cover fake aspirations and a hunger for pleasure..."
